metadata.synopsis: Shar calls out to Shadowheart and invites her to undertake her last trial in the Chamber of Loss
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Be on the Shar path with Shadowheart2. Go to the Shar Grotto3. Defeat Viconia

0.speaker: GROUP_SHA_VoiceOfShar
0.text: My Chosen, your final trial awaits. Enter the Chamber of Loss.
